HEADLINE: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform you that the transcript of earnings conference call held on 11th November 2022 to discuss the Unaudited financial Results for the quarter and half year ended on 30th September 2022.
